[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” css=”.vc_custom_1547843920053{padding-top: 30vh !important;padding-bottom: 20vh !important;background-image: url(http://www.atrinternational.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/Capture3.jpg?id=1339) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”custom-overlay gradient-overlay”][vc_column css_animation=”fadeIn”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

Meet Our Team

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” el_id=”team-scene”][vc_column css_animation=”fadeIn” css=”.vc_custom_1548112582970{padding-top: 120px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

The average tenure of ATR employees is 5.9 years, and for good reason. Our leadership, recruiting, account executive, and support staff teams are some of the most dedicated in the industry. Learn more about them below.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Leadership

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]
